sentences.sentence: Cell lysates were collected for Western blot analysis.
sentences.translation: 收集到的细胞溶解液均进行免疫印迹分析。

sentences.sentence: The GST-MBD4 fusion protein was purified from cell lysates using glutathione Sepharose 4b affinity chromatography.
sentences.translation: 用谷胱甘肽琼脂糖凝胶4b亲和介质从菌体裂解液中纯化了GST - MBD4融合蛋白。

sentences.sentence: ObjectiveTo investigate the effect of dendritic cells (DC) sensitized by tumor cells lysates on the murine breast cancer.
sentences.translation: 目的观察肿瘤细胞裂解物致敏树突状细胞(DC)对小鼠乳腺癌的治疗作用。
